items.sentence: I want to know more about the man who lives in that house.
Tom wanted to sell his car, but he couldn\'t find a buyer.
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to say it was his fault.
Tom didn\'t expect Mary to finish her homework so quickly.
Tom didn\'t seem to be having any trouble convincing Mary.
I assume you\'re referring to what happened here recently.
I assume you\'ve heard about what happened here yesterday.
Tom plays quarterback on our high school\'s football team.
Tom promised Mary that he\'d keep their engagement secret.
Tom promised he wouldn\'t say anything to Mary about that.
